para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:19px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Use the machine by following the precautions below to protect the machine equipment, plant, and surrounding environment from the danger of fire and to ensure the safety of operators.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ;
li.text: When using cutting fluid, be sure to use a water-soluble cutting fluid (type A1).

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: There is no fire hazard when using water-soluble cutting fluids (except when using them with special materials).

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ;
li.text: Oil-based cutting fluids present a potential fire hazard.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: If an oil-based cutting fluid must be used due to unavoidable circumstances, be sure to observe the precautions below.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:63px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:63px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Do not run the machine in an unmanned operation mode.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:63px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Install the proper fire-extinguishing equipment near the machine.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:63px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Provide alarm devices to detect a fire, automatic fire-extinguishing devices, and other equipment to the greatest extent possible.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:74px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:74px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: Do not create situations which may potentially start a fire.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:87px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:87px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: Machine under the proper cutting conditions.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:87px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: Perform proper tool management to prevent the occurrence of abnormal frictional heat and sparks.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:87px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: Do not allow chips to accumulate in the machining chamber.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:87px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: Check that a constant and full supply of cutting fluid is provided.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:87px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: Always clean up and organize the area around the machine, and do not place flammable objects in the area.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-26px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-26px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ;
li.text: Precautions for machining of flammable solids, resins, wood, and other flammable materials.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: When machining flammable solids or other special materials, be sure to fully implement safety measures after gaining a thorough understanding of the material properties. Be sure to also pay careful attention to safety when machining resins, wood, and other materials.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:1px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: When machining materials that generate dust and powder, be sure to provide equipment that takes into account the danger of a dust explosion for certain material types.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-26px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-26px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:62px left ;
li.text: Precautions for machining while blowing air.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Because air blowing has weak cooling performance, the chips that spray and fly out in the surrounding area are extremely hot. Do not place flammable objects in the machining chamber or in the area surrounding the machine.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
